name: Muchi Muchi SEXTRA
description:
This game is a visual novel game consisting of adult-oriented animation of a devil girl.
Despite her big rack and sexual appearance, she is innocent at heart!
The youkai girl "Nue" gets sexual revenge with smooth animation with voicing and sfx!

Continuation of the previous "Muchi Muchi SEX!" but can be enjoyed as a standalone product:

Contents:

6 main sex scenes + opening / ending
48 video files, 30fps
Erotic voicing / sfx included

Includes 6 different sexual positions (see sample images)

[Basic Progression]

Hold -> Penetrate -> Slow Sex -> Normal Speed -> Intense Sex -> Cum -> Continue
(contains specially constructed "continue" motions)

Switch between scenes with 1 click

* Please confirm system compatibility via the trial version before purchasing.
